statements: SELECT * FROM student_grades ORDER BY student_id DESC;
SELECT student_id, grade, learning_modality FROM student_grades WHERE grade = 'A';
SELECT * FROM student_grades WHERE learning_modality = 'Online' ORDER BY performance_metric ASC;
SELECT student_id, performance_metric FROM student_grades ORDER BY student_id ASC, performance_metric DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_students FROM student_grades;
SELECT * FROM student_grades ORDER BY student_id ASC, grade DESC
SELECT student_id, grade, performance_metric FROM student_grades WHERE learning_modality = 'Virtual' AND performance_metric > 3.5 ORDER BY performance_metric DESC
SELECT * FROM student_grades WHERE performance_metric BETWEEN 3.0 AND 4.0 ORDER BY student_id ASC
SELECT student_id, learning_modality, grade FROM student_grades WHERE grade IN ('A', 'B') AND learning_modality LIKE '%Ne%'
SELECT AVG(performance_metric) AS average_performance FROM student_grades
SELECT * FROM students WHERE grade = 12;
SELECT student_name, grade FROM students WHERE learning_modality = 'Online';
SELECT student_id, student_name, grade FROM students ORDER BY grade DESC;
SELECT student_id, student_name, grade FROM students WHERE grade > 10 AND learning_modality = 'In-person';
SELECT student_name, score FROM students JOIN performance_metrics ON students.student_id = performance_metrics.student_id WHERE score > 90;
SELECT * FROM students WHERE grade > 90 ORDER BY student_name DESC
SELECT student_name, grade FROM students WHERE learning_modality = 'Online'
SELECT student_name FROM students WHERE student_id = 3
SELECT student_name, grade, learning_modality FROM students WHERE student_id IN (1, 2, 3)
SELECT student_name, grade FROM students JOIN performance_metrics ON students.student_id = performance_metrics.student_id WHERE performance_metrics.score >= 85
SELECT * FROM Students WHERE grade_level = 10;
SELECT student_name, grade_level FROM Students WHERE grade_level > 8 ORDER BY grade_level DESC;
SELECT course_name, credit_hours FROM Courses WHERE credit_hours >= 3 ORDER BY course_name;
SELECT student_name, grade FROM Students S JOIN Grades G ON S.student_id = G.student_id WHERE grade > 90;
SELECT student_name, course_name, grade FROM Students S JOIN Grades G ON S.student_id = G.student_id JOIN Courses C ON G.course_id = C.course_id WHERE student_name = 'Alice';
SELECT student_name, grade FROM Students INNER JOIN Grades ON Students.student_id = Grades.student_id ORDER BY grade DESC
SELECT course_name, grade_date FROM Courses INNER JOIN Grades ON Courses.course_id = Grades.course_id ORDER BY grade_date DESC
SELECT student_id, student_name, grade, grade_date FROM Students INNER JOIN Grades ON Students.student_id = Grades.student_id WHERE grade >= 90
SELECT course_name, credit_hours, AVG(grade) as avg_grade FROM Courses INNER JOIN Grades ON Courses.course_id = Grades.course_id GROUP BY course_name, credit_hours

SELECT student_name, course_name, grade, grade_date FROM Students INNER JOIN Grades ON Students.student_id = Grades.student_id INNER JOIN Courses ON Courses.course_id = Grades.course_id ORDER BY student_name, grade
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT student_name, enrollment_date FROM students WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT course_name, credits FROM courses ORDER BY course_id DESC;
SELECT student_id, AVG(grade) AS average_grade FROM grades GROUP BY student_id;
SELECT student_id, course_id, metric_name, metric_value FROM performance_metrics WHERE metric_value > 90;
SELECT * FROM students WHERE student_name = 'Alice'
SELECT course_name, credits FROM courses WHERE credits > 3
SELECT student_name, enrollment_date FROM students ORDER BY enrollment_date DESC
SELECT * FROM grades WHERE grade >= 90 ORDER BY student_id, grade DESC

SELECT student_name, course_name, metric_name, metric_value FROM students s JOIN performance_metrics pm ON s.student_id = pm.student_id JOIN courses c ON pm.course_id = c.course_id WHERE metric_value > 0.5
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM students WHERE enrollment_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT course_name, instructor_name, start_date FROM courses ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT assessment_name, assessment_type, weight FROM assessments WHERE weight >= 0.5;
SELECT student_id, AVG(metric_value) AS average_metric_value FROM performance_metrics GROUP BY student_id;
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM students ORDER BY last_name ASC, first_name DESC;
SELECT course_name, instructor_name, start_date, end_date FROM courses WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT student_id, grade, grade_date FROM grades WHERE grade IN ('A', 'B') ORDER BY grade_date DESC;
SELECT assessment_name, assessment_type, weight, total_marks FROM assessments WHERE weight >= 0.5 AND total_marks <= 100;
